original_rows.3: Installation of Multi Cable transit frames complete with all insert blocks, stay plates, unused blocks with cables piece
LAYING OF CABLES
Laying of instrumentation cables for signal, alarm, shutdown, control and signal cable on ducts, main trays,
Signal / Alarm / Control Cables of cable sizes 1P x 1.5 / 2.5 mm²
Signal/ Alarm/ Control Cables of cable sizes 12C / 6P x 1.5 / 2.5 mm²
Signal/ Alarm/ Control Cables of cable sizes 24C /12P x 1.5/ 2.5  mm²
Special armoured serial link MODBUS TCP/IP/RS485 Serial/ cable
Laying of thermocouple/ RTD/ LEL Detector/ H2S Detector cables on ducts, main trays, perforated trays, angle trays,
1 Pair / 2 Pair x 16/20 AWG Thermocouple Cable
1 Triad/ Quad x 1.5 mm² RTD/ LEL Cable
8 Triad/ Quad x 2.5 mm² RTD/ LEL Cable
Laying of power cables on ducts, main trays, perforated trays, angle trays, trenches (including through IRCs)
For cable size   2C x 6 mm²
For cable size   2C x 10 mm²
For cable size   2C x 2.5 mm²
For cable size   2C x 4 mm²
SAND FILLING IN TRENCHES
Supply of sand and filling of concrete cable trenches with sand after cable laying is completed including levelling of
Trench Size   2000 mm (W) x 1500 mm   (D, total for trench, not depth of sand)
EARTHING
Supply, laying and termination of both ends of earthing cables from earth grid pit to the DCS/ Local panels/ Barrier
At both ends of earth grid/ Instruments of GI wire (12 AWG) in trays and conduits as required excluding earth-pit
For earthing cable 25 mm² size with PVC insulation.
PIPING / TUBING / FABRICATION WORK
Laying of copper tube for steam tracing of Instruments, primary impulse lines with steam traps/valve accessories
For sizes 1/4"/ 6 mm
DRILLING AND THREADING OF BLIND FLANGES
Making of 1/2" screwed connections on 1-1/2" blind flanges of specified materials/ ratings, by drilling holes and tapping
